title: הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא ליום הבחירות | Hosha-na for Election Day, by Isaac Gantwerk Mayer
author: Isaac Gantwerk Mayer

coauthors.name: Isaac Gantwerk Mayer
coauthors.bio: From a family of musicians, Isaac Gantwerk Mayer believes that creative art is one of the most powerful ways to get in touch with the divine. He composes music and poetry in Hebrew and English. (He also translates and transcribes Hebrew and Aramaic texts, adding niqqud and t'amim as needed.) Isaac runs a Jewish music transcription service, which will transcribe and set any Jewish music in any language, recorded or written. Contact his service on Facebook or via his music blog.

excerpt: A plea for the manifestation of righteous civic virtues on Election Day in the shadow of Hoshana Rabba. . . .

Source (Hebrew) Translation (English)
הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא – אַחֲוָה וְאֵמוּן בְּאַדְמָתֵֽנוּ – הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא
הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא – בְּרָכָה וּבִטָּחוֹן בִּבְחִירָתֵֽנוּ – הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא
הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא – גְּבוּרָה וּגְמִילַת חֶֽסֶד בִּגְדוֹלֵֽנוּ – הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא
הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא — דִּין וְדֶֽרֶךְ אֶֽרֶץ בְּדַיָּנֵֽינוּ — הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא
Hoshana — brotherhood and faith in our land — hoshana  
Hoshana — blessing and trust in our election — hoshana  
Hoshana — courage and merciful acts in our great ones — hoshana  
Hoshana — judgment and good sense in our judges — hoshana  
הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא — הוֹד וְהָדָר בְּהֵיכְלוֹתֵֽנוּ — הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא
הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא — וַדָּאוּת וּוֶֽתֶק בִּוְעָדֵֽינוּ — הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא
הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא — זְכוּת וּזְרִיזוּת בִּזְקֵנֵֽינוּ — הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא
הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא — חֵן וָחֶֽסֶד בְּחַבְלֵֽנוּ — הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא
Hoshana — splendor and beauty in our palaces — hoshana  
Hoshana — certainty and senority in our committees — hoshana  
Hoshana — merit and agility in our elders — hoshana  
Hoshana — grace and kindness in our borders — hoshana  
הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא — טוּב טַֽעַם בְּטִעוּנֵֽינוּ — הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא
הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא — יֹֽשֶׁר וִידִידוּת בִּיסוֹדוֹתֵֽינוּ — הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא
הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא — כָּבוֹד וְכִשָּׁרוֹן בְּכִנְסוֹתֵֽנוּ — הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא
הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא — לִמּוּד וָלֶֽקַח בְּלִשְׁכוֹתֵֽינוּ — הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא
Hoshana — good sense in our legal cases — hoshana  
Hoshana — integrity and friendship in our foundations — hoshana  
Hoshana — honor and aptitude in our assemblies — hoshana  
Hoshana — learning and receiving in our cabinets — hoshana  
הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא — מִדּוֹת מֵלִיץ בְּמֶמְשַׁלְתֵּֽנוּ — הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא
הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא — נְדִיבוּת וּנְצִיגוּת בְּנִהוּלֵֽנוּ — הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא
הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא — סִיּֽוּעַ וְסַבְלָנוּת בְּסַמְכֻיּוֹתֵֽינוּ — הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא
הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא — עֲנָוָה וָעֹֽצֶם בְּעֵדוֹתֵֽנוּ — הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא
Hoshana — an interceder’s attributes in our government — hoshana  
Hoshana — generosity and representation in our management — hoshana  
Hoshana — aid and patience in our authorities — hoshana  
Hoshana — humility and strength in our congregations — hoshana  
הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא — פְּאֵר וּפְדוּת בִּפְקִידֵֽינוּ — הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא
הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא — צְדָקָה וּצְנִיעוּת בְּצִבּוּרֵֽנוּ — הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא
הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא — קִדְמָה וְקִיּוּם בִּקְהִלּוֹתֵֽנוּ — הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא
הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא — רְוָיָה וְרַחֲמִים בְּרָשׁוּתֵֽנוּ — הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא
Hoshana — glory and liberation in our officials — hoshana  
Hoshana — righteousness and modesty in our public — hoshana  
Hoshana — progress and fulfillment in our communities — hoshana  
Hoshana — satiation and compassion in our administrations — hoshana  
הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא — שָׁלוֹם וְשַׁלְוָה בְּשִׁלְטוֹנֵֽנוּ — הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא
הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא — תְּקוּמָה וְתוֹחֶֽלֶת תִּקְוָה בִּתְקוּפָתֵֽנוּ — הוֹשַֽׁעְנָא
Hoshana — peace and tranquility in our regime — hoshana  
Hoshana — revival and a chance of hope in our era — hoshana  

This hosha-na for election day was offered by Isaac Gantwerk Mayer, and first published through his Facebook page on 5 November 2024.
